---
title: Web App Template
description: "An overview of the default Web Application template."
icon: "paperclip"
---

The Basic Web App template is the default choice for Celo Composer. It provides a solid foundation for building a modern, full-stack decentralized application on Celo.

## Key Technologies

This template comes pre-configured with a modern tech stack designed for performance and developer experience.

<CardGroup cols={2}>
  <Card title="Next.js 14+" icon="react">
    The latest version of the popular React framework, featuring the App Router,
    Server Components, and other modern features.
  </Card>
  <Card title="shadcn/ui & Tailwind CSS" icon="palette">
    A beautiful, accessible, and customizable component library built on top of
    Radix UI and Tailwind CSS.
  </Card>
  <Card title="TypeScript" icon="code">
    End-to-end type safety to help you build robust and maintainable
    applications.
  </Card>
  <Card title="Turborepo" icon="bolt">
    A high-performance build system for monorepos, enabling fast development and
    build times.
  </Card>
</CardGroup>

## Features

- **Production-Ready**: The template is structured and configured for production deployment from day one.
- **Responsive Design**: The UI is fully responsive and looks great on all devices, from mobile to desktop.
- **Monorepo Structure**: Organized as a monorepo with all applications located in the `apps` directory, promoting code sharing and scalability.

## When to Use

This template is the perfect starting point for a wide range of Celo dApps, including:

- DeFi applications
- NFT marketplaces
- Governance portals
- DAO tooling
- Any other dApp that requires a web-based user interface.
